page.title: 20HORSE RIDING IN HOPE DALE
page.content:
We farm at Wilderhope,our land is all round the old Manor,now used as a Youth Hostel and is situated in Hope Dale.One of the main{pastimes}in the area is horse riding and many farmer's children keep ponies,as do 2 of ours. There are lovely rides,the area being a maze of old footpaths and bridleways To the E.is Amstrey Ridge with views across the Corve Dale to the Clee Hills,to the W.is Wenlock Edge from where one can see the Stretton Hills and the Wrekin.In summer we care for the horses for riding clubs whilst the riders stay at the hostel.In winter the Wheatland Hunt frequently passes through our land.
